description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Management Console remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-38259):

1. Identify the version of Windows 11 you are using to determine the relevant KB article.
2. Download and apply the appropriate update package from the Microsoft Update Catalog for your build number:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2 (Build 10.0.26100.1742), apply KB5043080.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (Build 10.0.22631.4169), apply KB5043076.
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (Build 10.0.22621.4169), apply KB5043076.
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (Build 10.0.22000.3197), apply KB5043067.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure the updates are applied.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a remote code execution vulnerability classified under CWE-416 (Use After Free). 
- Ensure you are running a compatible version of Windows 11 before applying the updates.
- For manual installation, download the updates from the following links:
  - [KB5043067](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043067)
  - [KB5043076](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043076)
  - [KB5043080](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5043080).
  
**Preconditions**:
- Verify the current build of Windows 11 to choose the correct update.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
